name: hidemyemail
title: Hide My Email
description: Quick and easy way to view and manage your Hide My Email addresses.
author: svenhofman

commands.name: list-emails
commands.title: List Emails
commands.description: Lists all the Hide My Email addresses associated with iCloud account.

preferences.name: sortByCreationDate
preferences.title: Sort list by creation date
preferences.label: Sort list on most recently created address
preferences.description: If enabled, the email list is sorted on most recently created.

commands.name: create-new-email
commands.title: Create New Email
commands.description: Opens form to create a new email Hide My Email address

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
